message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $18,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find something similar within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below its value.  I could consider letting it go for $15,000.  This is my final offer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still looking for a product within my budget and I am willing to pay $12,000 for the product.
